instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1398: What is A1398? A1398 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2015, Mid 2012, Early 2013, Late 2013, Mid 2014 with EMC 2909, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00138, 820-00163, 820-00426, 820-3332, 820-3662, 820-3787..
definitions.U8900: What is U8900? This chip creates the GPU power rails on the 820-3332 board to the 2012 and early 2013 15‚Äù Retina Macbook Pros. It becomes desoldered and is the cause of no video and kernel panics/crashes in that model most of the time..
definitions.820-3332: What is 820-3332? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: Early 2013 15" <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Freezes on startup before showing login screen
threads.message: Hello!, i have MB pro <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A which started firstly panicking, after i had no image so <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> was replaced and now there is image but machine freezes on startup and i can see keyboard lights up, caps lock light works, even sound but image is stil stuckl on apple logo. When closing lid backlight still on. Tried to clean ME with CH341A, haven't helped. And noticed after ASD machine boots fine, but works only for 20-30min until gets kernel panic and after restart same thing. Thank you for support! :)

threads.title: Early 2013 15" <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Freezes on startup before showing login screen
threads.message:
No Title

Got a log. Looks like GPU issue?, same <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> causing problems?

threads.title: Early 2013 15" <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Freezes on startup before showing login screen
threads.message:
Reflow GMUX.
If doesn't help, I suppose you have GPU issue...

threads.title: Early 2013 15" <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Freezes on startup before showing login screen
threads.message: Could be GMUX could be VRAM. Any damage to the fan screw hole on the right side of the board?

Sorry, might sound a bit stupid, but where exactly GMUX IC are located or named on schematics, can't find info about that one? Actually i did find, that screwhole is a little bit damaged.
